des:
This skill reads from the book "Words of Wisdom" (Volume 1) from Buddhist Master Jun Hong Lu. 

The free book is downloadable under https://ebooks.xinlingfamen.info/.

Guan Yin Citta Dharma Door belongs to the Mahayana Buddhist Tradition. It encourages people to recite Buddhist scriptures, practise life liberation and make great vows to help more people. Guan Yin Citta opens the door to happiness. It provides us with a practical way to learn the infinite wisdom of the Buddha, and elevates us above everyday life filled with sorrow and strife. 
For more information visit: https://www.guanyincitta.info/

In case of any errors, please contact me and I will fix it.
